metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11364 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: sav_parse_machine_integer_info_record in spss/readstat_sav_read.c in libreadstat.a in ReadStat 0.1.1 has a memory leak related to an iconv_open call.

criterions.comment: r-cran-haven: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
